title: Create Professional Surveys in Minutes
description: Build engaging surveys with multiple question types, collect responses, and analyze results all in one powerful platform.
subtitle: Everything You Need

features.title: Multiple Question Types
features.description: Text, multiple choice, checkboxes, ratings, and drag-and-drop ranking questions.

features.title: Real-time Analytics
features.description: View and analyze survey responses with detailed statistics and insights.

features.title: Secure & Private
features.description: Admin approval system and email verification ensure secure access control.

features.title: Time Limits
features.description: Set optional time limits for surveys to create urgency and improve response rates.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
